DESCRIPTION: You can use light, less-restrictive armor that still allows agile movement.
AUTHOR: WOTC

DESCRIPTION: You can use moderate but more restrictive armor that still allows some agility.
AUTHOR: WOTC

DESCRIPTION: You can use armors that are heavy and do not allow agile movement but offer the most protection against physical attack.
AUTHOR: WOTC

DESCRIPTION: You can wield a shield to augment your protection in battle.
AUTHOR: WOTC

DESCRIPTION: You can wear light and medium armor and use shields, but you will not use anything made of metal as it disconnects you from your connection with Nature.
AUTHOR: WOTC

DESCRIPTION: You are not trained in the use of any armor.
AUTHOR: WOTC
